Meat: 4 slices of bread (torn to small pieces)

directions.text: Using a deep pan fry mushrooms up an set aside.
Mix all 'Meat' ingredients and form into balls.
With oil brown balls over high heat in a pan and remove.
Add 1 cup of water to pan and cook for 1 min.
Add bouillon and balls back and then simmer covered for 1 hour.
